content: **cat ball 2-tones ☆free pattern☆** i saw a few versions of this & thought i d make my own & share it with you after all it s just an oval shape with little paws using a popcorn & a long tail for more photos visit my site if you re a beginner to crochet then use only 1 color no color changes to see how it works once you feel comfortable with the pattern then try it again with the color changes for the 2-tone effect details ★ height 5 cm / 2 approximately ★ width 7 7 cm / 3″ approximately legal info feel free to share this pattern but not for sale it s free for everyone you can sell the finished toy based on this pattern however please refer back to me as the designer & provide a link here or to my site https //astaeditions com/ 1 1 https //astaeditions com/products/cat-ball-2-tones-free-pattern/
